amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to permit air transportation service between midnight and 6 a.m. at Ronald Reagan National Airport (DCA).
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to permit air transportation service between midnight and 6 a.m. at Ronald Reagan National Airport (DCA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A045) Failed by voice vote.
